snippet: Meningitis can cause death in a few hours, and if the bill is signed, all students entering seventh grade would have to be vaccinated against it.
abstract: New York State Legislature passes bill requiring seventh graders to be vaccinated for meningitis.
lead_paragraph: Meningitis can cause death in a few hours, and if the bill is signed, all students entering seventh grade would have to be vaccinated against it.

headline.main: Meningitis Vaccine Mandate for Seventh Graders in New York Passes
headline.print_headline: Meningitis Vaccine Mandate for Seventh Graders Passes
